three_concept/concept/train/Harry/0.png: The main character is a young man with glasses, wearing a white shirt and a brown tie.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/1.png: The main character is a young man with glasses, wearing a red and black shirt, standing in front of a large stone monument with the name "Thomas Marvolo Riddle" etched on it.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/2.png: The main character is a young man with wavy brown hair, wearing glasses and a black vest over a white shirt.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/3.png: The main character is a young man with brown hair and glasses.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/4.png: The main character is a young wizard named Harry Potter, who is known for his lightning-shaped scar on his forehead and his role as a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/5.png: The main character is a young man with a thoughtful expression, wearing glasses and a black jacket with a gray zipper.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/6.png: The main character is a young man with dark hair and glasses, wearing a red sweater.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/7.png: The main character is a young man with dark hair, wearing glasses and a blue plaid shirt.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/8.png: The main character is a young man with dark hair, wearing glasses and a maroon tie.
three_concept/concept/train/Harry/9.png: The main character is a young man with wavy brown hair, wearing a black sweater, a white collared shirt, and a maroon tie. He is also wearing glasses and has a serious expression on his face.
16-tokens-caption: <Harry> is a young man with glasses and a serious expression.
